caption:
This photograph captures an unusual scene involving a bright red, futuristic-looking car with a large, black, clamshell-style canopy that is open. Two men are seated in the car, appearing cheerful and spirited. The man on the left, with brown hair and wearing a beige jacket, excitedly raises both of his hands in the air. The man on the right, with darker hair, also seems to be in a joyful mood, and wears a dark blue suit with a light blue shirt.

Behind them, an older man is standing outside the car, to the left, dressed in a dark suit and tie, observing and perhaps supervising the situation. The background features a commercial or office building with a stone facade and large windows reflecting the surrounding, including a canopy labeled "CLEARANCE 8'4"".

The setting has a distinctly vintage or retro flavor, indicated by the architecture and the style of clothing. The overall ambiance of the image suggests a special event or demonstration possibly related to the unique car, featuring excitement and engagement from the participants.
title: Exhibit at the first symposium on low pollution power systems development held at the marriott motor inn, ann arbor vehicles and hardware were assembled at the epa ann arbor laboratory.  Part of the exhibit was held in the motel parking lot shown here is the esb "sundancer" electric car (developed for research purposes only)
